With over 70 developer members, Bit Project has reached more than 3,100 students. The group is working to expand its community through technical workshops, coding bootcamps, and outreach programs.

Daniel and his team recently decided to launch a new five-week course to teach beginning web development. They considered using React as the basis for the course but found that the extreme customization available with React made it tough for teaching. Instead, they chose Gatsby.
